name: Dairy-Free Chowder
author: Kr Pr
summary: Non-dairy chowder. Add fish for fish chowder; add shrimp or scallops for seafood chowder; add corn for corn chowder.
ingredients: 2 medium russet potatoes, peeled and diced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat a large pot over medium heat
Add 1/4 cup oil, onion, celery, and bacon
Cook and stir until bacon fat renders and onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a boil
Cook until potatoes are fork-tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Add clams and cook for 10 minutes more
Meanwhile, combine 1/4 cup oil and flour in a separate saucepan over medium heat
Stir until paste-like and light golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Gradually whisk in almond milk; cook and stir until mixture becomes a thick slurry, 6 to 7 minutes more
Stir slurry into the chowder to thicken it
